Course_Name: [SoSe 2024] Seminar: Recent Trends in Deep Learning for Computer Vision

Messages.Author: Tom Oswald Burgert
Messages.Content: Dear students, I would like to draw your attention to our new job offer at RSiM (my research group): https://www.jobs.tu-berlin.de/stellenausschreibungen/185072  If you are interested, feel free to apply.   Best, Tom

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Reminder: Deadline for registration in MOSES

Messages.Author: Tom Oswald Burgert
Messages.Content: Dear students, this is a gentle reminder that the deadline for registration in MOSES for the DL4CV seminar is 14.05.2024 at 23:55. Best, Tom

Messages.Author: Tom Oswald Burgert
Messages.Content: Dear students, thank you for your emails and especially to those that listed more than three topics, it enabled a topic assignment such that everyone can work with a topic they are intersted in. The assignemnts look the following: - Data Augmentation: Jan & Felix - Semi-Supervised Learning: Erik & Hung Bui - Self-Supervised Learning: Konrad & Maximilian - Modern CNNs & Transformer: Cedric & Johannes - Memorization & Generalization: Gunnar & Siyu Xiao - Special Aspects of Learning: Florian & Achim It nicely fit such that no one needs to work alone. I would propose the following new schedule, since 3 topics were not selected: - 22.05 Data Augmentation - 29.05 Semi-Supervised Learning - 05.06 Self-Supervised Learning - 12.06 Modern CNNs vs. Vision Transformer - 19.06 Memorization and Generalization - 26.06 Special Aspects of Learning - 03.07 Optional: Texture Bias (either presented by me if the students are interested to hear more about this topic / or assigned to students that missed the deadline) - 17.07 no class (or backup) I hope you are all fine with this. Please let me know, if you are not okay with this change of the schedule.  Best, Tom

Discussions.Discussion_Name: Reminder: Deadline for submitting priority list of topics

Messages.Author: Tom Oswald Burgert
Messages.Content: Dear all, here is a small reminder that you need to send the priority list of topics to me (t.burgert@tu-berlin.de) until tomorrow (Friday, the 19th) 2pm.  Best, Tom
